snippet.title: Cheese Tortellini Pesto Pasta Salad
snippet.description: This is most definately my FAVORITE pasta salad in the world! I have been making it for years, but never wrote it down....well...thanks to Recipezaar...

snippet.title: Tortellini & Bow Tie Pasta Salad
snippet.description: This is the best tasting Italian Style Pasta salad I have ever eaten. I received this recipe from a caterer at our church Cyndy Totten, who gave me permission...

snippet.title: Colorful Tortellini Pasta Salad
snippet.description: I get a lot of requests for this pretty and flavorful pasta salad. I like lighter dressing, so if you like more, you may want to increase the oil and...

snippet.title: Rosemary Tortellini Pasta Salad
snippet.description: Absolutely delicious! I often have requests from friends to make this pasta salad at cook outs, etc. This recipe is adapted from Southern Living.

snippet.title: Caesar Tortellini Pasta Salad
snippet.description: This is based on a recipe from the Buitoni web site, but with changes of course! You can use parmesean, but the gorgonzolla cheese is a great combination...

snippet.title: Mediterranean Tortellini Pasta Salad
snippet.description: A hearty pasta salad that is a favorite among friends and family. A friend whom owns a restaurant actually added it to her menu!

snippet.title: Cheesy Bacon Ranch Pasta Salad
snippet.description: Working at a pizza shop in high school, I loved a recipe similar to this. After years of trying to duplicate it, I think I've come about as close...

snippet.title: Deliciously Different Pasta Salad
snippet.description: This really is a deliciously different pasta salad that even the hard to please members of my family just loved. It has alot of great Mediterranean flavors...

snippet.title: Mediterranean Artichoke Pasta Salad
snippet.description: This salad will keep in the fridge for 3-4 days. It can easily be adapted to feed a large crowd. Any type of pasta will work for this recipe. Stacey
